cRIO_timestamp.description: Time for the first sample of each telemetry item in this topic, as measured by the cRIO clock, as unix time.

elevationMotorVelocity.description: Measured velocity of elevation drive motor at 100 Hz beginning at the specified time.

azimuthMotor1Velocity.description: Measured velocity of azimuth drive 1 motor at 100 Hz beginning at the specified time.

azimuthMotor2Velocity.description: Measured velocity of azimuth drive 2 motor at 100 Hz beginning at the specified time.

nasmyth1MotorVelocity.description: Measured velocity of Nasmyth 1 drive motor at 100 Hz beginning at the specified time.

nasmyth2MotorVelocity.description: Measured velocity of Nasmyth 2 drive motor at 100 Hz beginning at the specified time.

m3Velocity.description: Measured velocity of M3 rotator drive motor at 100 Hz beginning at the specified time.
